message: Hello Bob, I believe this product could greatly benefit you and I'm happy to discuss a deal. To start the conversation, I propose a price of $1,150,000.
Thank you for considering my request, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $1,050,000.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm confident that this product can bring you even more value than that. How about we meet in the middle at $1,110,000?
I understand your perspective, Alice. Considering the value proposition and my financial constraints, I would like to counter with a price of $1,080,000.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,100,000. I believe this price reflects the true value this product will bring to your business.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering the ongoing negotiations, I would like to propose a price of $1,075,000.
